alert.note: Alert for Yukon Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 18 at 5:20AM AKDT until March 21 at 6:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions possible. Total snow accumulations of 3 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Yukon Delta. * WHEN...From late Sunday night through Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Large snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blizzard conditions are possible starting late Sunday night and will continue into Tuesday.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch for blizzard conditions means there is a potential for falling and/or blowing snow with strong winds and extremely poor visibilities. This can lead to whiteout conditions and make travel very difficult.
